Text:
Hello? Is anyone seeding? It's a ghost town here!

Also, is this just the songs, or is there some speech in between which explains how these songs are meant to be linked?

I've been seeding almost nonstop since October.  I hope you've gotten it by now.

It's a staged production with four performers, who give short intros to each song.
I did get it thanks, but then my hard drive packed up so I've got to get it again! D'oh!
